subject: Soccer
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: Abby Wambach scored four goals as the World Cup-bound United States defeated Costa Rica, 6-0, in Chester, Pa., for the team’s fifth Concacaf Women’s Championship title.
snippet: Abby Wambach scored four goals as the World Cup-bound United States defeated Costa Rica, 6-0, in Chester, Pa., for the team’s fifth Concacaf Women’s Championship title.
